meanings.definition: The form of the English language spoken and written in England.
meanings.sent1: In England, people speak and write in different englishes.
meanings.sent2: The englishes spoken in England have unique accents and vocabulary.
meanings.sent3: When visiting England, I was amazed by the variety of englishes I heard.
meanings.sent4: The englishes of England sing with a rich history and culture.
meanings.sent5: The different englishes in England make communication diverse and interesting.

meanings.definition: The various forms of the English language spoken and written in different regions or by different groups of people.
meanings.sent1: Traveling around the world exposes you to diverse englishes.
meanings.sent2: Englishes from different regions can have unique slang and expressions.
meanings.sent3: I find it fascinating how englishes can vary so much from place to place.
meanings.sent4: The tapestry of englishes we encounter enriches our understanding of language.
meanings.sent5: Exploring various englishes opens up new perspectives and insights.
